name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."
I'm back in the candle-lit room. Koujaku is standing in front of me.
His body is covered by the tattoo, but life has returned to his eyes.
When I peer into them, I see sadness.

name: 紅雀
message: "When I snapped out of it, I couldn't believe what I'd done. It had to be a nightmare, right? But it wasn't. ...And that's when I started to really lose it."

name: 紅雀
message: "I wanted to. I wanted to die. That's what I deserved."

name: 紅雀
message: "I'd killed my mom. What right did I have to live? So... I tried to use that sword on myself."

name: 紅雀
message: "It was the right thing to do. At least, that's what I thought..."

name: 紅雀
message: "But I couldn't do it. No matter how hard I tried. ...I kept seeing your face."
Koujaku looks at me, face twisted with pain.

name: 紅雀
message: "I remembered you smiling, back when we were kids, and I started crying. I felt so sad... and afraid. I couldn't do a thing."

name: 紅雀
message: "I really did want to die... but I wanted to live just as bad. I didn't know what to do..."

name: 紅雀
message: "So I decided to return to the island. I couldn't even kill myself. I was a failure in every way... but I just had to see you."

name: 紅雀
message: "Maybe it was just an easy lie to tell myself, but I thought something might change if I saw you again."

name: 紅雀
message: "When I saw you all grown up, I was so surprised. But your smile, that hadn't changed."

name: 紅雀
message: "It made me think that maybe everything would be okay. Maybe, if we stuck together, the pain would go away in time."

name: 紅雀
message: "But it didn't work. No matter how hard I tried to forget, that moment... the candles, the blood... kept coming back to haunt me."

name: 紅雀
message: "And then, like a fucking cosmic joke... that asshole Ryuuhou showed up."

name: 紅雀
message: "The moment I saw him, it all came into focus. I thought, I can't run. Never could. I have to kill him... then myself."

name: 紅雀
message: "I knew all along it wouldn't change anything. I knew."

name: 紅雀
message: "But I figured, I'd already bought myself a ticket to hell. Getting a little revenge couldn't make it any worse."

name: 紅雀
message: "Well, I got what I wanted. But that doesn't change what I did, and it won't make the ink on my back go away."

name: 紅雀
message: "Really, all I did was dirty my hands even more. So what the fuck does any of it matter anymore?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I'm a monster. Why fight it?"
Koujaku lowers his head. I realize that the black tattoos from before have wound themselves around his feet.
Koujaku...
What I saw was indeed his past, the part he never told me about.
I can't blame him for keeping it secret.
How are you supposed to talk about something like that? How might I have responded?
However deep our relationship, it was only natural for Koujaku to worry.
And in fact, I do feel conflicted. Not because I'm shocked by what Koujaku did... but because I don't know what to say.
Words seem powerless in the face of such a past.
The look on Koujaku's face is one of utter resignation. The black tattoos have reached his waist, and are now making their way toward his chest.
It's like... like Koujaku is letting Ryuuhou's work devour him.
Koujaku hurt a lot of people. His mother died because of what he did.
But none of that was Koujaku's fault. It was all because of that fucking tattoo―Ryuuhou's work, and Toue's.
But of course, Koujaku knows that, and still he blames himself.
You can't change the past.
But still...<K> I don't want to lose him.
Maybe I'm just being selfish. I don't care. I can't just stand here and watch while Koujaku destroys himself.
Koujaku is a prisoner―both to Ryuuhou's tattoos and to his own memories of the past.
His wounds are just too deep. He'll never stem the flow of blood on his own.
If I leave him like this, they'll swallow him whole.
And so, before that happens...
I will destroy them.
<center>　――――　DESTROY　――――</center>
<center>　――――　DESTROY HIM　――――</center>
My power, Scrap, can only destroy.
I'll destroy Koujaku, and free him from his past.
I walk up to Koujaku and grab his shoulders.
Slowly, he lifts his head and stares at me with hollow eyes.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku... Don't give up!"
